Package moa.evaluation

Interface RegressionPerformanceEvaluator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CapabilitiesHandler, LearningPerformanceEvaluator<Example<Instance>>, MOAObject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicMultiTargetPerformanceEvaluator, BasicMultiTargetPerformanceRelativeMeasuresEvaluator, BasicRegressionPerformanceEvaluator, MultiTargetWindowRegressionPerformanceEvaluator, MultiTargetWindowRegressionPerformanceRelativeMeasuresEvaluator, WindowRegressionPerformanceEvaluator

    public interface RegressionPerformanceEvaluator
extends LearningPerformanceEvaluator<Example<Instance>>
    Interface implemented by learner evaluators to monitor the results of the regression learning process.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
